title: So I take it we'll be having Snowdown next March or some sh*t, right?
body:
I mean, if we're untying Holiday Events from the Holidays themselves then surely it would be appropriate to release Santa Gragas and Snowstorm Sivir at some random point after the fact 'because reasons mumble mumble making lore less restricted mumble mumble all hail our Chinese overlords'.

Halloween isn't really celebrated here in Australia - it just hasn't caught on yet. I've always lived Halloween through the likes of Runescape, Combat Arms, and now League of Legends. THe various games I've played with friends over the years. So I have to say that RIOT RUINED HALLOWEEN FOR ME THIS YEAR. It didn't *feel* like Halloween at all.

replies.body:
Calm the fuck down kid. Did you even read the most recent lore chapters? Well if you did you'd know they mentioned Illaoi; the newest upcoming champion. 

**You know what would make sense?**
Harrowing and Illaoi combined event.

Not to mention they just wrapped up worlds, you can't overload the player base or else events end up meaning nothing.
It sure felt like Worlds to me! <|:^)
